column2: ENGLISH
Demand Removal of The King's Peace
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding the removal of The King's Peace. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Remove The King's Peace in [This.GetName]
Members seek to remove The King's Peace in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Demand Removal of The Emperor's Peace
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding the removal of The Emperor's Peace. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Remove The Emperor's Peace in [This.GetName]
Members seek to remove The Emperor's Peace in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Demand Removal of Title Revocation
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding the removal of Title Revocation. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Remove Title Revocation in [This.GetName]
Members seek to remove Title Revocation in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Demand Removal of Protected Inheritance
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding the removal of Protected Inheritance. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Remove Protected Inheritance in [This.GetName]
Members seek to remove Protected Inheritance in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Demand Reduced Crown Levies
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding lower Crown Levies. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Reduce Crown Levies in [This.GetName]
Members seek to reduce Crown Levies in [This.GetName]. When sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
Convert a Province

You want to convert a province, making your religious head happy and showing your piety to the world. Your stewardship will be reduced by two as you're busy helping your court chaplain convert the heathens.
Amass Fortune
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is already well-off, but seeks a true fortune.
Amass a Hoard of Wealth
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to swim in [This.GetHerHis] vault of gold!
Be Seen Publicly As Pious
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to be known to all as a pious man
[This.GetTitledFirstName] seeks to become known for [This.GetObjectPronoun] virtues.
Become Distinguished Among the Nobility
[This.GetTitledFirstName] seeks to become distinguished among the nobility
Seek Fame and Glory
While already notable, [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks [This.GetObjectPronoun] deserves true fame and glory for [This.GetHerHis] deeds.
Virtuous
Glorious
